content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “business day” means Monday to Friday, excluding holidays.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“business day” means Monday to Friday, excluding holidays.

content.content: 2. For the purpose of the definition of “non-cash expense” in subsection 1 (1) of the Act, each of the following expenses is prescribed as a non-cash expense:
